name: War ^ 3!
description:
Way back then, more than a decade ago, I made a top down shooter called War! War! War!. It was mostly for my sisters and I to play. It was local multiplayer on the keyboard, and each soldier was in a war, of course, with a lot of weapons at disposal. It almost had a sandboxy feel, because a lot of things could interact. It was a testament to pre-Yoyogames Game Maker's flexibility. The assets were all from free asset packs from the Game Maker website from way back then.

It was the most complete first game I made that I have not released at all in any capacity. So this is a remake of it.
